description.lang: The Smart Smoke Alarm adopts Z-Wave protocol, when the sensor detects smoke to the set level, it will issueacoustic-optic alarm to alert the users and also send alarm notifications to gateway immediately.It's suitable to be installed in living room, office,warehouse,and etc.
This is Lifeline association group, Including command classes: Battery report, Notification report, and Device Reset Locally notification

This is Root Device group,The Sensor sends a Basic Set command to directly trigger devices (like a light, switch, etc.) in response to events. The value of the Basic Set command (e.g. Siren trigger) is configured usingsmoke or no smoke.
